entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person of authority and power in the story, as he is able to whip around and cast spells. ("He aimed a spell at her but she deflected it.")

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a person who tries to stop Harry from attacking Bellatrix. ("‘Harry — no!’ cried Lupin, but Harry had already ripped his arm from Lupin’s slackened grip.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is angry and vengeful after learning that Bellatrix killed Sirius. ("‘SHE KILLED SIRIUS!’ bellowed Harry. ‘SHE KILLED HIM — I’LL KILL HER!’")

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is a person who has killed Sirius and is being attacked by Harry. ("‘SHE KILLED SIRIUS!’ bellowed Harry.")

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a person who was killed by Bellatrix. ("‘SHE KILLED SIRIUS!’ bellowed Harry.")

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a person who is present in the scene but not actively involved. ("He leapt over Luna, who was groaning on the floor, past Ginny,")

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is a person who is injured and lying on the floor. ("He leapt over Luna, who was groaning on the floor,")

relationships.description: Harry attacks Bellatrix after learning that she killed Sirius. ("‘SHE KILLED SIRIUS!’ bellowed Harry. ‘SHE KILLED HIM — I’LL KILL HER!’")
Bellatrix killed Sirius, which leads to Harry's attack on her. ("‘SHE KILLED SIRIUS!’ bellowed Harry.")
Harry passes by Luna who is lying on the floor. ("He leapt over Luna, who was groaning on the floor,")
Harry passes by Ginny who is present in the scene but not actively involved. ("He leapt over Luna, who was groaning on the floor, past Ginny,")
